summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new hero carousel implementation inspired by coders.edu.az design. All core functionality working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Admin login page UI not loading properly at /admin/login route
design_issues.note: Admin API functionality works perfectly via direct API calls, only UI access issue

passed_tests: Backend API - 100% success rate (18/18 tests passed)
Hero carousel displays with two-column layout (text left, image right)
Category tag buttons are visible and clickable with proper navigation
Main CTA button works and links to WhatsApp correctly
Hero carousel auto-plays between slides (5-second intervals)
Navigation arrows and dots work properly
Admin slides API - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
Other homepage sections unchanged (testimonials, courses, blog carousel, CTA)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin login page UI loading issue at /admin/login route. The admin API functionality is working perfectly, but the frontend login form is not rendering properly.
